content.text:
# Draft:Waris 1954

Waris Bollywood 1954 movie directed by Nitin Bose
Produced by sohrab Modi
Music Anil biswas
Starring singers Talhat mehmood, suraiya, Nadira,this film deals with the theme of mistaken identity. Suraiya is the main lead of the movie she also rendered songs for the movie . Talhat mehmood is the main male leads and nadira played supporting role with negative shades in it. Film is very good and music is also very nice
References
